modName: Lind's Vaermina Robes Revamp - Replacer and Standalone
summary:
This is a texture replacer for the Vaermina Robes (Male and Female) found in the Dawnstar questline, featuring 2048x2048 textures.
Male and female Compatible, works with all bodies. I've added an optional custom hood as there's no hood for these robes in the Vanilla game.
descriptionHtml:
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Description & Installation:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[b]
This is a texture replacer for the Vaermina Robes (Male and Female) found in the Dawnstar questline, featuring 2048x2048 textures.
Male and female Compatible, works with all bodies. [u]I've added an optional custom hood as there's no hood for these robes in the Vanilla game.[/u]
[u]
Textures Installation[/u]: Simply Unzip and copy the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. [u]Compatible with edited meshes for every body replacer.[/u] Be mindful that excessively skimpy meshes may distrupt the textures.
The vaerminavariantrobes.dds and vaerminavariantrobes_n.dds files should end up into Data/textures/clothes/monk[/b]
Overwrite if asked.

[b][u]Custom UNPB TBBP Meshes Installation[/u]:[/b] [b]Unzip and copy the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.[/b] Overwrite if asked.

[b][u]Robes + Optional Hood installation[/u]: [/b][b]Unzip and copy the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.[/b] [i]Activate the LindsVaerminaHood.esp[/i] through the Skyrim Launcher or your favourite Mod Organizer.


[center][b][size=2][size=3][i]My other works:[/i][/size]

[/size][/b][size=2][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74948/?]Lind's Elven Eyes - 40+ New High-Res Eyes[/url][/i][i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75674/?]Lind's Human Eyes - 50+ New High-Res Eyes[/url]
[b]
Standalone Robes[/b]:

[/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74242/?][i]Lind's Standalone Robes Pack 01[/i]
[/url]
[b][i]Robes Texture Replacers:[/i][/b][/size][/center][size=2]
[/size][center][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72751/?]Robes of Vaermina[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71249/?]Black - The Warlock[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36817/?]Monk - Priest of the Divines[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70920/?]Green - The Bosmer Mage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36078/?]Red - The Battlemage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59734/?]Blue - Court Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59769/?]Brown - The Wandering Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36173/?]Grey - The Moth Priest[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36049/?]Necromancer Robes - The King of Worms[/url]

[url=http://lindsworkshop.tumblr.com/]You can stay updated on what I'm doing through my Tumblr.

[img]http://s18.postimg.org/gnyqvvwll/Tumblr_Lind.jpg[/img][/url]

For those of you who don't fancy Tumblr, [url=https://twitter.com/LindsRealm] I just made this.

[img]https://s24.postimg.org/qey3j9tp1/Twitter.png[/img][/url]

[center]P.s. I love reading comments, let me know what you think. I'll be glad to respond. (:[/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]More Informations:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[i][u]

[/u]
This release include two variants of the Vaermina Robes, a gold trimmed one and a silver trimmed one.




[/i][size=3]Replacer Version[/size][i]


Texture Replacer versions [u]do not[/u] include the hood.
[/i]
You may only pick one, it is up to you to choose between the gold and the silver variant.[i]
[/i]
To install the textures manually simply merge the Data folder contained in my archive with the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.[i]

[/i][size=3]Standalone Version:[/size][i]
[/i]

To differentiate my robes from the vanilla ones, I renamed them as follow:[i]

The [color=#cfe2f3][b]Silver[/b][/color] Trimmed Version are named the [color=#cfe2f3][b]Dreamwalker Robes[/b][/color] in the Standalone Version.

The [b][color=#ffd966]Gold[/color][/b] Trimmed Version are named the [b][color=#ffd966]Dreamstrider Robes[/color][/b] in the Standalone Version.

[/i]
To keep lore-friendly-ness and immersion, I scattered some notes around the NightCaller Temple (Vaermina Questline), once you acquire said notes the robes will become available for crafting at any tanning rack as long as you have the respective recipe in your inventory.

The option to craft the robes will not be displayed if you're not carrying the notes, this way your crafting list won't be cluttered with unnecessary recipes.[i]
[/i]
The robes are craftable at a tanning rack using the following items:[i]

- 5+3 Deathbells

- 3+1 Nightshade flowers

- 3+1 Gold/Silver Ingots depending on the robes

- 8+2 pieces of Leather

- 5+5 Strips of leather

- 1 Iron ingot

- 1 piece of Charcoal
[/i]
[size=2][size=2]In addtion, once crafted the robes are enchantable, and the Hood allows for circlets to be worn with it.

[/size][/size]
[size=2][size=2][i][img]http://i.imgur.com/sfILMWb.png[/img][/i][/size][/size][i][/i][/center][center][i][quote]"With that, she pulled the void away, and for hours each night she would reveal to Darius the most horrible perversions of nature.
Men being skinned and eaten alive by other men,
unimaginable beasts of many limbs and mouths,
entire populations being burned
Â  [...] their screams filled his every evening.[/quote][/i]

These are the robes worn by the Vaermina Worshippers, and supposedly the fanciest and hardest to obtain in the Vanilla game. And let's be honest, while they still suffer from the Bathrobe syndrome, the original ones aren't all that bad.

But why no hood? Are you telling me that out of ALL Wizards of Skyrim, the worshippers of the a Daedric Princess who crawls into th dreams of men, the most intimate of secrets, are the only ones who choose not to hide their faces?

-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Videos, Reviews, Etc.[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[center][i][b]21/01/2016[/b][/i]

[img]http://s18.postimg.org/45afl097t/Senza_titolo_1.jpg[/img]

[i][b]Thank you! (;



-------- Old Version! -------

Showcase by Syltra, robes at 1:12

[youtube]DRK3Pc5FBWo[/youtube][/b][/i][/center]

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]F.A.Q.[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

Q. Is the Hood part of the Robes?
A. No, it's separate, you can also wear circlets and Earrings along with it.

Q. I can't craft the Hood.
A. It's crafted at a tanning rack, it requires you to be carrying the Notes.

Q. Can you release Quinn/Violet (Characters in the Screenshots) as an ECE/Racemenu preset or follower?
A. I'm afraid not.

Q. Will you release a full pack including all of the long robes?
A. Yes I will, however I will not remove the individual robes mods when I do.


Q. How do you sculp/create your characters?
A. Racemenu, I'm working on releasing a video tutorial and a mod list.


[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Credits:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center][i]Credits are important, please support these people and never forget to include credits in your own mods.[/i]

[center][i]Thank you for downloading!


[b]Assets used:[/b]

Hood:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]Ashara Princess of the Woods[/url] by SydneyB,
thank you for having your meshes available for use!
[/i][/center][i]
[b]Poses:[/b]
[/i]
[i]Halo's Poser S by Halofarm
GomaPeroPero Poser by GomaPeroPero
Aloe's Poser by Aloerim[/i]
[b][/b][/size][i][b][/b][/i]

[size=2][center][center][i][b]A message to:[/b][/i][i][b]

Mi. Gr. , Ti. Lo. , Angrylock , [/b][b]vintagelf , [i][b]Ge. Jo. Ry.[/b][/i][/b] [b], Da. Ta.[/b]

Thank you for your donations, it was unexpected, but I really appreciated it. (:[/i]

[i]I'd love to add donators to the credits to show my appreciation, problem
being through Paypal I can only see your real name, not the username, so [u]message me if you'd like to be added![/u][/i][u]
[/u][u]
[/u][/center][i][b][/b][/i][/center]
-----------------------------------------------------------
[b]Permissions:[/b][/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[u][i]Please do not redistribute or edit this file without my approval.

Feel free to use the robes on follower mods.

You are free to showcase this file in YouTube videos and/or screenshots and/or mod reviews.

For anything else, feel free to PM me, DM me on Twitter or send me an Ask on Tumblr.[/i][/u][i](:[/i][u][i]
[/i][/u]
author: Lind001 - LindsWorkshop
